item.title: Mentioned by Bayshore Broadcasting News Centre
item.description:
Stanton Defends PM Decision
Simcoe North MP Bruce Stanton says people should not be getting upset over the Prime Minister's announcement that he will prorogue Parliament, likely until October when his government will deliver a throne speech outlining a new agenda. Stanton says ...
